name: Everlasting Moonglow
title: Emblem of Pearl and Waves: Everlasting Moonglow
desc: "Even if the storm clouds should gather, and even if the violet lightning's ferocity be perilous and unpredictable.\nThe silver moon of Watatsumi shall still pierce through the clouds and scatter forth its light."
in_play_description:
When the character to which this is attached has at least 11 HP: DMG +2.
When played: The character to which this is attached gains 1 Max HP.

skills.desc:
When the character to which this is attached has at least 11 HP: DMG +2.
When played: The character to which this is attached gains 1 Max HP.
(Only Catalyst characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon)
